content.question: In the fifth paragraph, Tom’s description of the “gentleman caller” has which effect?

choices.label: It forces Tom to reconsider his attitude toward the other characters in the play.
It prompts Tom to admit that he is prone to attaching figurative meaning to characters.
It highlights Tom’s refusal to accept reality when it challenges his illusions.
It suggests Tom’s steadfast belief that his father will eventually return to the family.

content.answer: It prompts Tom to admit that he is prone to attaching figurative meaning to characters.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
